import numpy as np
import gym
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class DQN(Module):
    def __init__(self):
        self.policy=nn.Sequential(
            nn.Linear(4,50),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Linear(50,2)
        )
    
    def forward(self,x): 
        x=Tensor(x).to(default_device())
        return torch.argmax(self.policy(x),dim=0)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class TestDataset(Dataset):
    def __init__(self,policy):
        self.policy=policy
        self.env=gym.make('CartPole-v1')
        self.next_state=self.env.reset()
        
    def __len__(self): return 100
    def __getitem__(self,idx):
        print(id(self.env),' ')
        self.next_state, r, is_done, _=self.env.step(self.policy(self.next_state).numpy())
        if is_done:self.next_state=self.env.reset()
        return self.next_state
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for x in DataLoader(TestDataset(DQN().to(default_device())),num_workers=5):
    print(x)
